elements.description:
# oe-datepicker

`<oe-datepicker>` is a control  to select `date` from the display.

properties.name: startOfWeek
properties.description: Start of week, expressed as 0-6

properties.name: disabledDays
properties.description: Weekly offs expressed as [0-6]

properties.name: holidays
properties.description:
List of dates that should be disabled for selection,
 Should be Date objects or date strings in 'MM-DD-YYYY' format

properties.name: max
properties.description: Maximum selectable date

properties.name: min
properties.description: Minimum selectable date

methods.name: _valueChanged
methods.description: Observer on value changed to create display for month and year.

methods.name: _prevMonth
methods.description: Renders previous month display

methods.name: _nextMonth
methods.description: Renders next month display

methods.name: _prevYear
methods.description: Selects previous year

methods.name: _nextYear
methods.description: Selects next year

methods.name: _doubleClick
methods.description: On double click of a date set it as selected date.

methods.name: _pickDate
methods.description: Sets the selected UTC date as value

methods.name: getDetails
methods.description: Returns a detailed information on the date.

methods.name: _pickMonth
methods.description: Selects a month and prepare the display

params.name: e
params.description: Event contains the month to select

methods.name: _pickYear
methods.description: Selects the year and prepares the display

params.name: e
params.description: Event contains the year to select

methods.name: _getDateClass
methods.description: Returns CSS classes for the date components for styling.

methods.name: prepareMonth
methods.description:
Prepares the month array with startdate, enddate and padding,
so as to position the days correctly using dom-repeat.

methods.name: _isDateDisabled
methods.description:
Checks if the input date is diabled based on
'min','max' and 'disabledDays' list.

methods.name: _equals
methods.description: String compare used in dom-if

methods.name: _showYear
methods.description: Displays the list of months of selected year

methods.name: _nextDecade
methods.description: Displays years from the next decade

methods.name: _prevDecade
methods.description: Displays years from the previous decade

methods.name: _showDecade
methods.description: Displays the years of the selected decade

methods.name: _settingsChanged
methods.description: Prepares the internationalized dates list

methods.name: connectedCallback
methods.description: Displays list of days by default on attached to DOM.

methods.name: _renderCurrentMonth
methods.description: Renders the current month's days

staticMethods.name: _createIntlSettings
staticMethods.description: Creates a default setting for Internationalized date time format

elements.name: OeDatepicker

attributes.name: start-of-week
attributes.description: Start of week, expressed as 0-6

attributes.name: disabled-days
attributes.description: Weekly offs expressed as [0-6]

attributes.name: holidays
attributes.description:
List of dates that should be disabled for selection,
 Should be Date objects or date strings in 'MM-DD-YYYY' format

attributes.name: max
attributes.description: Maximum selectable date

attributes.name: min
attributes.description: Minimum selectable date

events.name: selection-changed
events.description: Occurs when a date is selected.

events.name: selection-double-click
events.description: Occurs when user double-clicks a date to select it.

elements.description:
# oe-datepicker-dlg

`<oe-datepicker-dlg>` is a control used in oe-date to display the date-picker in a dialog box.
Raises event `oe-date-picked` when date is selected.

properties.name: startOfWeek
properties.description: Denotes the day to be used as the start of week

properties.name: disabledDays
properties.description:
Array of days of the week to set as disabled.
Example [5,6] to set 5th and 6th day of week as disabled.

properties.name: holidays
properties.description:
List of dates that should be disabled for selection,
 Should be Date objects or date strings in 'MM-DD-YYYY' format

properties.name: max
properties.description: Maximum selectable date

properties.name: min
properties.description: Minimum selectable date

properties.name: defaultDate
properties.description: Default reference date to select when value is not defined

methods.name: open
methods.description: Opens the dialog box by setting the value aor current Date in UTC

methods.name: _showMonth
methods.description: Displays all the days of the selected month

methods.name: _showYear
methods.description: Displays all the months of the selected year

methods.name: _showDecade
methods.description: Displays all the years of the selected decade.

methods.name: _refreshDetails
methods.description: Refreshes the display with date from the event.

methods.name: _selectionConfirmed
methods.description:
Listener to double-click of a date in datepicker.
Sets day,month,year and 'value'.

methods.name: _onOK
methods.description: Sets the selected value and closes the dialog.

methods.name: _onCancel
methods.description: Closes the dialog box

methods.name: patchOverlay
methods.description: Pactch to move the backdrop behind the dialog box.

elements.name: OeDatepickerDlg

attributes.name: start-of-week
attributes.description: Denotes the day to be used as the start of week

attributes.name: disabled-days
attributes.description:
Array of days of the week to set as disabled.
Example [5,6] to set 5th and 6th day of week as disabled.

attributes.name: holidays
attributes.description:
List of dates that should be disabled for selection,
 Should be Date objects or date strings in 'MM-DD-YYYY' format

attributes.name: max
attributes.description: Maximum selectable date

attributes.name: min
attributes.description: Minimum selectable date

attributes.name: default-date
attributes.description: Default reference date to select when value is not defined

events.name: oe-date-picked
events.description: Occurs when a date is selected by pressing the Ok button.

elements.description:
# oe-date

`<oe-date>` is a control  to capture `date` data. `value` property exposes the selected date always in midnight UTC.

properties.name: errorPlaceholders
properties.description: i18n placeholders for the error

properties.name: userErrorMessage
properties.description:
User specified Custom error message
If userErrorMessage is defined, show appropriate user-error-message
which is either an object
   ```{
      rangeOverflow:'Date should be prior',
      default: 'Invalid Value in field'
   }```
or a string, 'Invalid value'
So check if specific error-coode is defined in user-error-message object
If not, see if 'default' error-code is defined
otherwise if user-error-message is string, show that error-message,
if not, then resort to incoming-error-message.

properties.name: errorMessage
properties.description: Error message displayed

properties.name: _hasCustomMessage
properties.description: Flag for Custom error message/code

properties.name: validationFunction
properties.description: Custom validation function

properties.name: fieldId
properties.description: binding to property

properties.name: _focusableElement
properties.description:
Returns a reference to the focusable element. Overridden from
PaperInputBehavior to correctly focus the native input.

properties.name: inputElement
properties.description: Returns a reference to the input element.

properties.name: init
properties.description: Initial/default value for the control

properties.name: hideIcon
properties.description: Setting to true hides the calender icon in the control which open the datepicker dialog

properties.name: dropdownMode
properties.description: Setting to true makes the datepicker open as a dropdown instead of a dialog

properties.name: verticalOffset
properties.description: vertical offset for date picker dropdown

properties.name: verticalAlign
properties.description: vertical alignment for date picker dropdown

properties.name: openOnFocus
properties.description:
Setting to true makes the datepicker open as a dropdown on focus of this element.
This will work only if the oe-date component is in dropdown-mode.

properties.name: max
properties.description: Maximum allowed date (accepts date shorthands)

properties.name: min
properties.description: Minimum allowed date (accepts date shorthands)

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: flag allows enabling/disabling the control

properties.name: startOfWeek
properties.description: Start of the week for calendar display [0(Sunday)-6(Saturday)]

properties.name: disabledDays
properties.description: Weekly off days [0(Sunday)-6(Saturday)]

properties.name: invalid
properties.description: control's validity flag

methods.name: setValidity
methods.description:
Sets the vality and errorMessage based on the input parameters and
the `userErrorMessage`

params.name: errorMessage
params.description: error message from the input element

methods.name: _setValidity
methods.description: Sets the 'invalid' flag and 'errorMessage'

params.name: errorMessage
params.description: error message from the input element

methods.name: _validate
methods.description: Override in individual elements to return element specific validity.

methods.name: validate
methods.description:
Validate, overrides Paper-Input-Behavior's validate method
Used to set the validity based on core input element's validity

methods.name: connectedCallback
methods.description: Connected Callback to initiate 'change' listener with validation function.

methods.name: hashFunc
methods.description: Generates a Hash for the given string.

params.name: str
params.description: String for which Hash needs to be computed

return.desc: hash number for the given string

methods.name: _showDatePicker
methods.description: Launches date-picker as dialog or a dropdown

methods.name: _datePicked
methods.description: Called when date is selected using dialog

methods.name: _onOK
methods.description: Sets the selected value and closes the dropdown

methods.name: _onCancel
methods.description: Closes the dropdown

methods.name: _maxChanged
methods.description: Parses the shorthand for "max" and validates the value.

methods.name: _minChanged
methods.description: Parses the shorthand for "min" and validates the value.

events.name: oe-field-error
events.description: Fired when the field is invalid

events.name: oe-field-ok
events.description: Fired when the field is valid

events.name: register-field
events.description: Fired when the element is attached to DOM to register the element

elements.description:
# oe-datetime

`<oe-datetime>` is a control to capture the date-time value.

properties.name: errorPlaceholders
properties.description: i18n placeholders for the error

properties.name: userErrorMessage
properties.description:
User specified Custom error message
If userErrorMessage is defined, show appropriate user-error-message
which is either an object
   ```{
      rangeOverflow:'Date should be prior',
      default: 'Invalid Value in field'
   }```
or a string, 'Invalid value'
So check if specific error-coode is defined in user-error-message object
If not, see if 'default' error-code is defined
otherwise if user-error-message is string, show that error-message,
if not, then resort to incoming-error-message.

properties.name: errorMessage
properties.description: Error message displayed

properties.name: _hasCustomMessage
properties.description: Flag for Custom error message/code

properties.name: validationFunction
properties.description: Custom validation function

properties.name: fieldId
properties.description: binding to property

properties.name: _focusableElement
properties.description:
Returns a reference to the focusable element. Overridden from
PaperInputBehavior to correctly focus the native input.

properties.name: inputElement
properties.description: Returns a reference to the input element.

properties.name: init
properties.description: Initial/default value for the control

properties.name: min
properties.description: Minimum allowed value

properties.name: max
properties.description: Maximum allowed value

properties.name: dateValue
properties.description: The date component of time displayed.

properties.name: hour
properties.description: The hour component of the time displayed.

properties.name: minute
properties.description: The minute component of the time displayed.

properties.name: txtAMPM
properties.description: currently displayed value on AM/PM toggle

properties.name: hideIcon
properties.description: Setting to true hides the calender icon in the control which open the datepicker dialog

properties.name: dropdownMode
properties.description: Setting to true makes the datepicker open as a dropdown instead of a dialog

properties.name: openOnFocus
properties.description:
Setting to true makes the datepicker open as a dropdown on focus of this element.
This will work only if the oe-datetime component is in dropdown-mode.

methods.name: setValidity
methods.description:
Sets the vality and errorMessage based on the input parameters and
the `userErrorMessage`

params.name: errorMessage
params.description: error message from the input element

methods.name: _setValidity
methods.description: Sets the 'invalid' flag and 'errorMessage'

params.name: errorMessage
params.description: error message from the input element

methods.name: _validate
methods.description: Override in individual elements to return element specific validity.

methods.name: validate
methods.description:
Validate, overrides Paper-Input-Behavior's validate method
Used to set the validity based on core input element's validity

methods.name: connectedCallback
methods.description: Checks if the min and max values are valid , then attaches event listerners.

methods.name: hashFunc
methods.description: Generates a Hash for the given string.

params.name: str
params.description: String for which Hash needs to be computed

return.desc: hash number for the given string

methods.name: _focusHandle
methods.description: Handles opening the dropdown on focus of input based on 'openOnFocus' flag

methods.name: _valueChanged
methods.description: Observer on value change to set the hour and minute from Date time.

methods.name: _computeValue
methods.description: Computes the DateTime value for given date, hour and minute.

methods.name: _dateValueChanged
methods.description: Validates the date selected from date-picker and sets the value

methods.name: _displayChanged
methods.description:
Change event listener that parses the shorthand values given in input like 'tom' or 'today',
and sets the parsed DateTime on the 'value' property.

methods.name: _showDatePicker
methods.description: Displays the datepicker in dropdown or dialog-box

methods.name: _onOK
methods.description:
Sets the date selected in datePicker as the date value
and closes the date-picker.

methods.name: _onCancel
methods.description: Resets datepicker selection and closes the date-picker

methods.name: _computeIcon
methods.description: Selects the icon to display on the input.

methods.name: _datePicked
methods.description: Sets the value for hour and minute once the date is selected

methods.name: _computeAriaLabel
methods.description: Generates new aria label be joining two input labels

elements.description:
# oe-time

`<oe-time>` is a control  to capture `time` data.

properties.name: required
properties.description: Set to true to mark the input as required.

properties.name: hour
properties.description: The hour component of the time displayed.

properties.name: minute
properties.description: The minute component of the time displayed.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Set to true to disable the hour and minute input elements.

properties.name: autofocus
properties.description: Set to true to autofocus the month input element.

properties.name: inputmode
properties.description: Bound to the hour and minute input elements' `inputmode` property.

properties.name: readonly
properties.description: Set to true to mark the hour and minute inputs as not editable.

methods.name: connectedCallback
methods.description: Connected Callback to initiate event listeners.

methods.name: _valuesChanged
methods.description: Sets the AM/PM and pads the hour and minute values.

methods.name: validate
methods.description: Custom validation

methods.name: _computeAriaLabel
methods.description: Computes aria-label

elements.name: OeTime

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: Set to true to mark the input as required.

attributes.name: hour
attributes.description: The hour component of the time displayed.

attributes.name: minute
attributes.description: The minute component of the time displayed.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Set to true to disable the hour and minute input elements.

attributes.name: autofocus
attributes.description: Set to true to autofocus the month input element.

attributes.name: inputmode
attributes.description: Bound to the hour and minute input elements' `inputmode` property.

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.description: Set to true to mark the hour and minute inputs as not editable.

mixins.description:
`OEDateMixin`
This is the Mixin that takes care of default validation of oe-ui input components

properties.name: value
properties.description: Property to be binded for the value

properties.name: format
properties.description: String to specify the format in which the data needs to be displayed in the input.

properties.name: holidays
properties.description:
List of dates that should be disabled for selection,
 Should be Date objects or date strings in 'MM-DD-YYYY' format

properties.name: disabledDays
properties.description: Weekly offs expressed as [0-6]

properties.name: locale
properties.description: Locale to be used by oe-date-picker

properties.name: disableTextInput
properties.description: Prevent manual entry of date value

properties.name: referenceTimezone
properties.description:
reference for date calculation is `today` in user's TZ (represented as UTC00:00).
   i.e. At 02:30 AM IST on 5th-Nov-2019.
   The reference date would be 2019-11-05 00:00:00Z
At the same moment, person sitting in PST (GMT -7:00) sees
   current date and time as 2019-11-04 14:00 PM.
   For her the reference date would be 2019-11-04 00:00:00Z

If `referenceTimezone` is specified
   Reference date is current-date in reference-TZ (with time set to UTC00:00)
   i.e. setting referenceTimezone = -420 (minutes) means
   users in anytimezone will see the reference date to be (2019-11-04 00:00:00Z)
Default value `OEUtils.componentDefaults["oe-date"].referenceTimezone`

properties.name: referenceDate
properties.description:
Reference for date calculation. Defaults to global component-defaults.
If no global defaults are provided, current 'date' in user's timezone
adjusted to `referenceTimezone` (if specified) is used.

methods.name: __disableInput
methods.description: Set oe-input to readonly on disableTextInput flag

methods.name: _handleOverlayOpen
methods.description:
When overlay is opened set the oe-input to readonly and disabled to
prevent the Mobile keyboard from launching

methods.name: _handleOverlayClose
methods.description: When overlay is closed reset back to original settings

methods.name: _clearDate
methods.description: Clear the date value entered

methods.name: _formattingChanged
methods.description: Observer on 'format' property to update the display based on the format.

methods.name: _parseShorthand
methods.description:
Converts the user shortHand inputs to Date values.
computes values for 'today' , 3y , -7M etc.

methods.name: _parseDecimal
methods.description: Parses the input string into a float after validation

return.desc: parsed float value or undefined if the input cannot be parsed.

methods.name: _calcDate
methods.description:
Computes a date based on given parameters.
converts a date , 1 ,'year' to return a new Date which is date+1year.

methods.name: _format
methods.description: Formats the input Date and returns a formatted string

methods.name: _valueChanged
methods.description: Observer on value property.

methods.name: _displayChanged
methods.description: Event listener for changes to input

methods.name: _validate
methods.description:
Custom validation to check if entered values is not a
disabled day or a holiday.

mixins.name: DateMixin

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Property to be binded for the value

attributes.name: format
attributes.description: String to specify the format in which the data needs to be displayed in the input.

attributes.name: holidays
attributes.description:
List of dates that should be disabled for selection,
 Should be Date objects or date strings in 'MM-DD-YYYY' format

attributes.name: disabled-days
attributes.description: Weekly offs expressed as [0-6]

attributes.name: locale
attributes.description: Locale to be used by oe-date-picker

attributes.name: disable-text-input
attributes.description: Prevent manual entry of date value

attributes.name: reference-timezone
attributes.description:
reference for date calculation is `today` in user's TZ (represented as UTC00:00).
   i.e. At 02:30 AM IST on 5th-Nov-2019.
   The reference date would be 2019-11-05 00:00:00Z
At the same moment, person sitting in PST (GMT -7:00) sees
   current date and time as 2019-11-04 14:00 PM.
   For her the reference date would be 2019-11-04 00:00:00Z

If `referenceTimezone` is specified
   Reference date is current-date in reference-TZ (with time set to UTC00:00)
   i.e. setting referenceTimezone = -420 (minutes) means
   users in anytimezone will see the reference date to be (2019-11-04 00:00:00Z)
Default value `OEUtils.componentDefaults["oe-date"].referenceTimezone`

attributes.name: reference-date
attributes.description:
Reference for date calculation. Defaults to global component-defaults.
If no global defaults are provided, current 'date' in user's timezone
adjusted to `referenceTimezone` (if specified) is used.

mixins.description:
`OETimeMixin`
This is the Mixin that takes care of default validation of oe-ui input components

methods.name: _pad
methods.description: Adds padding to given number

methods.name: _onHourChange
methods.description: Parses the input enetered does 24hr -> 12hr conversion

methods.name: _onMinuteChange
methods.description: Parses the input entered and pads additonal zeroes.

methods.name: _onKeyup
methods.description: Handles up/down arrow keys on inputs

methods.name: _toggleAMPM
methods.description: Toggles AM/PM display

methods.name: _hoursDisplay
methods.description: Returns hour string after converting 24hr -> 12hr conversion

methods.name: _minutesDisplay
methods.description: Returns minute string padded with necessary zeroes

mixins.name: TimeMixin
